sense.def:
A draft of a letter, book, or speech
je zgodnja različica pisma, knjige ali govora.

To draft a letter, book, or speech
pomeni napisati prvo različico pisma, knjige ali govora.

seg.quote: They drafted a letter to the local newspaper.

sense.def:
To be drafted
pomeni dobiti ukaz za služenje v enem od delov armade svoje domovine;

cit.quote: biti vpoklican ali rekrutiran v vojsko

seg.quote: I was drafted into the navy.

sense.def:
Kadar so osebe
drafted somewhere
, jih nekam pošljejo opravljat določeno delo.

cit.quote: izbrati in poslati s posebno nalogo

seg.quote: Extra staff were drafted from Paris to Rome.
